To uploader:
Dude u rock!

How do I burn to Nero - Use Nero Vision it will transcode to DVD. Select Create DVD (not editable), add video files, select a menu (however I have had problems with no menu so maybe you may want a menu), Otherwise write to disk and then do a Nero Recode. Then select your DVD write. Your golden.
